entry.source: We Casualries have a favor to ask of you.{F801}Please come to Kiccigiorgi Forest so I can{F801}discuss the details in person. This is{F801}something we cannot do on our own. We{F801}desperately need a Samurai's assistance in{F801}this matter.{F801}
entry.target: We Casualries have a favor to ask of you.{F801}Please come to Kiccigiorgi Forest so I can{F801}discuss the details in person. This is{F801}something we cannot do on our own. We{F801}desperately need a Samurai's assistance in{F801}this matter.{F801}
